characterInfo.Occupation: Soldier,  Member of the Unseen Court
characterInfo.Appears in: Words of Radiance, Oathbringer, Rhythm of War

characterDescription:
Red is a darkeyed soldier who joined Highprince Vamah's call to arms. He joined with five of his buddies, all of whom are now dead.
Red deserted the Alethi army, along with Gaz and others, because the lighteyes stopped fighting to win the war and started fighting for spheres instead.
His first encounter with Shallan Davar is as a deserter/mercenary whilst in pursuit of her caravan on it's way to the Shattered Plains, Tvlakv and his crew as her escort.
Red and his cohorts are then implored by Shallan to intervene in a slaughter before them, and are convinced by her that they can erase their pasts and start over as heroes.
At a drop point, Red deposited a pack for her that contained Veil's outfit.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is a lanky, bearded man.
characterDetails.Personality: Red, along with his fellow deserters, is an affable man who seized a chance to live a normal life again and is determined to hold to it. He maintained his discipline and was quick and eager to serve Shallan.
